{{Wired embedded system |brand=Technologic Systems |model=TS-TPC-8900 |revision=-4800 REV. A |is_manuf=Yes |price=760 |est_release_date=08/2011 |type=touch panel computer |pwr_v=5-28 |pwr_conn=2-pin |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Freescale (NXP) |cpu1_model=i.MX51;MCIMX515CJM6C; |cpu1_cspeed=600 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F4G08U0B-PCB0 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T1G164QQ-HCE6 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, PC/104 bus |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, 10-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1),, console |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=SMSC |eth_chip2_model=LAN8710A |eth_chip3_brand=SMSC |eth_chip3_model=LAN9514 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=Hi-Speed USB Transceiver w/ULPI Interface;SMSC;USB3315;;1;,,, Serial Real Time Clock Chip;STMicro;M41T00S;;1;,,, 2.7V 11-14Bit Digital Temperature Sensor;TI;LM73;;1;,,, PMIC for i.MX35/51;Freescale Semiconductor;MC13892;;1;,,, Low Power Stereo Codec;Freescale Semiconductor;SGTL5000;;1;,,, Touch Screen Digitizer;Analog Devices;AD7843;;1;,,, 3.3V Programmable LVDS Transmitter 24-Bit Flat Panel Display Link;TI;DS90C385A;;1;,,, FPGA w/8K LUTs;Lattice;LFXP2-8E;;1;,,, FPGA w/5K LUTs;Lattice;LFXP2-5E;;1;,,, PoE IEEE 802.3af PD Interface w/Integrated Switching Regulator;Linear Technology;LTC4267-1;;1;,,, 5V RS232 Transceiver;Sipex;SP213E;;1;,,, 5V RS-485/RS-422 Transceiver;Sipex;SP4082E;;3;,,, High-Speed CAN Transceiver;NXP;TJA1050T;;2;,,, 1-Channel Transistor Output Optocoupler;Lite-On;LTV-357T;;1;,,, Dual Switching Diode;Diodes Inc;BAV99;;2;,,, Low-Voltage Adjustable Shunt Regulator;TI;TLV431A;;1;,,, 42V Constant On-Time PFET Buck Switching Controller;TI;LM25085;;1;,,, 150V N-Channel Powertrench MOSFET;Fairchild;FDC2512;;1;,,, 1A 1000V Bridge Rectifier;Diodes Inc.;DF10S;;2; 40V P-Channel Enhancement Mode MOSFET;Diodes Inc.;DMP4051;;1;,,, Dual-Channel Power Distribution Switch;Microchip;MIC2026-1BM;;1;,,, Silicon Switching Diode Array;Infineon;BGX50A;;4;,,, 3-State Octal Bus Transceiver;NXP;74LVC245A;;5;,,, 27V ESD Protection Diode;ON Semi;NUP2105L;;2;,,, Data Selector/Multiplexer w/3-State Output;TI;SN74HC251;;1;,,, Microprocessor Reset Circuit;ST Micro;STM1001;;2;,,, 1.3MHz Step-Up Switching Regulator w/1.4A Switch;Semtech;S4503;;1;,,, UHS Buffer w/3-State Output;ON Semi;NC7SZ125;;1;,,, 725mW Audio Power Amplifier w/Shutdown Mode;TI;LM4864;;1;,,, Octal Edge-Triggered D-Type Flip-Flop w/3-State Output;TI;SN74LVC374A;;1;,,, 2.5MHz 2A Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Semtech;SC183C;;1;,,, Tri-Mode 300mA LDO Regulator w/Enable;ON Semi;NCP585;;2;,,, 1.5A Low Quiescent Current Synchronous Buck Regulator;Renesas;ISL8009A;;1;,,, Dual Inverter Gate;TI;SN74LVC2G04;;1; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, 8"/10" LCD display, XBEE socket, speaker, Audio out (3.5 mm), RTC w/ battery, UART, CAN Bus, Touchscreen }} {{TagLine|Video GPU & FPU Mountable Touch Panel Computer}} :[https://www.embeddedts.com/products/TS-TPC-8900-4800 Product page]
===Documentation=== *[https://docs.embeddedts.com/TS-TPC-8900-4800 ''Baseboard Documentation''] *[https://docs.embeddedts.com/TS-4800 ''Computer-on-Module Documentation''] *[https://github.com/embeddedarm ''Code Respository'']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Freescale (NXP)]] i.MX51 (MCIMX515CJM6C) :ARM (Cortex-A8) @600MHz *Storage: 512MB (NAND) Flash, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 256MB (DDR2) SDRAM *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *PCI: 1x PCIe (USB only) port *Network: 2x FE ports *Power Source: 5-28V via 2-pin connector or 802.3af PoE
==Images== <gallery> File:Technologic Systems TS-4800 Top.jpeg|SoM Board Top File:Technologic Systems TS-4800 Bottom.jpeg|SoM Board Bottom File:Technologic Systems TS-TPC-8900 Top.jpeg|Carrier Board Top File:Technologic Systems TS-TPC-8900 Bottom.jpeg|Carrier Board Bottom File:Technologic Systems TS-TPC-8900-4800 Top.jpeg|System Top File:Technologic Systems TS-TPC-8900-4800 Bottom.jpeg|System Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
